trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Definiuje metody i właściwości do zapisu <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method in order to obtain a fixed-document writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład przedstawia użycie <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> metody w celu uzyskania stałej moduł zapisujący dodawania <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> zawartości do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A> method.
The image type of the thumbnail to add.
Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
Only one thumbnail image can represent the document as a whole (although individual pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Tylko jeden obraz miniatury może reprezentować dokumentu jako całość (chociaż poszczególnych stron może mieć własne obrazy miniatur).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the document already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> Jest generowany, jeśli <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> jest wywoływane, gdy dokument ma już miniatury.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Liczba opróżnień i zamyka <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> składnika zapisywania.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> writer.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład przedstawia użycie <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> metodę, aby opróżnić i zamknąć <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> składnika zapisywania.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera liczony od zera pozycja <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> property is zero-based.

A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> value of zero (0) indicates the first the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> wartość zero (0) oznacza pierwszy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> w <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Sets default print options for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Ustawienie tej właściwości nie sprawdza, czy lub zmodyfikować określonego <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> dla konkretnej <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli to konieczne, użyj <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodę w celu utworzenia <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-określonych <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> która jest prawidłowa dla danego drukarki.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład przedstawia użycie <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> właściwość do skojarzenia <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> z <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
